content.query:
USER MASTER
GO
CREATE LOGIN demologin WITH PASSWORD='Pass@word123'
GO
USE MYSERVERLESSDB
GO
CREATE USER demouser FROM LOGIN demologin
GO

alter role db_datareader ADD MEMBER demouser
 GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::[MYCREDENTIAL] TO [demouser];


/*
 EXEC sp_addrolemember 'db_datareader' ,'demouser' -- 
 PROCEDURE 'sp_addrolemember' is not supported.

*/
